scripts.cucumber: node ./node_modules/@cucumber/cucumber/bin/cucumber-js features/**/*.feature --require-module ts-node/register --require features/**/*.ts --format summary --format progress-bar
scripts.cucumber-check: node ./node_modules/@cucumber/cucumber/bin/cucumber-js features/**/*.feature --dry-run --require env/set-environment-variables.ts --require world/custom-world.ts --require step-definitions/**/*.ts --require hooks/**/*.ts  --require-module ts-node/register --format-options "{\"snippetInterface\": \"async-await\"}" --format summary --format progress --format progress-bar
scripts.snippets: node ./node_modules/@cucumber/cucumber/bin/cucumber-js features/**/*.feature --dry-run --require env/set-environment-variables.ts --require world/custom-world.ts --require step-definitions/**/*.ts --require hooks/**/*.ts  --require-module ts-node/register --format-options "{\"snippetInterface\": \"async-await\"}" --format snippets
scripts.steps-usage: node ./node_modules/@cucumber/cucumber/bin/cucumber-js features/**/*.feature --dry-run --require env/set-environment-variables.ts --require world/custom-world.ts --require step-definitions/**/*.ts --require hooks/**/*.ts  --require-module ts-node/register --format-options "{\"snippetInterface\": \"async-await\"}" --format usage
scripts.test:cucumber: npx cucumber-js features/**/*.feature --config cucumber.yaml   --require-module tsx --require features/support/setup.ts --require features/steps/**/*.ts -f progress-bar --parallel 8 --fail-fast
scripts.build:wasm: cargo build --manifest-path wasm-logic/Cargo.toml --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && rm -rf app/src/wasm && mkdir -p app/src/wasm && wasm-bindgen --target web --out-dir app/src/wasm --no-typescript wasm-logic/target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/wasm_logic.wasm
